post.author: 강재형
post.content:
Job Profile
Advertisement number: 57241
Title: Software developer (Sr Hyperion Essbase Developer) (NOC: 2174)  
Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time
Salary: To be negotiated
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Richmond Hill, Ontario (1 vacancy)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Some university
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Information Systems Professional (ISP)
Experience: 3 - 5 years
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English
Other Information: 1. Hyperion Essbase 2. Hyperion Analyzer 3. Oracle 4. SQL 5. PL/SQL Team member role involved in supporting and maintaining existing Essbase environment that includes 2 different Essbase solutions utilizing Hyperion Analyzer as the web-based, analytical front-end. Requires script log review, page file analysis, view group, view set & form modification. Should understand: Essbase Enterprise Services, dynamic calcs, esscmds, Essbase performance tuning.嚥?base Integration Server

Employer: 3K CONSULTING (Placement Agency)

How to Apply:  Contact Name: Derek Edwards
By E-mail: 3k.consulting@rogers.com

Advertised until: 2002/08/27
post.title: Software Develper(Sr. Hyperion Essbase Developer)
